channel.title: Nomination for Server Helper
channel.description: I want to nominate imsuperman05 for the Server Helper award because he helps a lot. He hasn't been much lately, but when you look at his stats the majority are in the Server help section and more than half are non-trolling and if he does get it, I'm sure it will give him a moral boost to continue helping.

item.title: Nomination for Server Helper
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I suppose we’ll consider it. Thanks for the nomination.

Read full topic
